title: Clinique Aromatics Elixir Eau De Toilette 45ml
description:
Kicks off with toning and astringent qualities that also give the sense of calm. The mid-notes begin with a warm oakmoss scent and a touch of a clean floral scent. title: Clinique Exfoliating Scrub for Combination Oily to Oily Skin Types 100ml
description:
Clinique Exfoliating Scrub for Combination Oily to Oily Skin Types 100ml

Helps to control oil-related problems; skin looks translucent, clearer, brighter; takes edge off tiny lines and wrinkles; wakes up tired skin. Better stimulation; gives a light reflecting glow to mature skin. Allows better makeup application and moisturiser to absorb more easily. Promotes even skin tone refines texture. Moisten makeup-free skin with water. Using fingertips, massage product onto skin in a circular motion, avoiding the eye area and lips. Rinse and follow with 3-Step Skin Care System. Use as needed. Avoid using on active breakout.

title: Clearblue Digital Pregnancy Test With Weeks Indicator - 1 test
description:
Clearblue Pregnancy Test With Weeks Indicator, Kit Of 1 Digital TestThe Clearblue Pregnancy Test with Weeks Indicator is the first and only test that is as accurate as an ultrasound scan at dating pregnancy*. Its smart dual sensor not only tells you in words on the digital display if you're pregnant or not pregnant, it also tells you how far along you are – the weeks since conception are shown as 1-2, 2-3 or 3+. You can test 5 days before your missed period (which is 4 days before your expected period). In lab testing, 98% of pregnant results were detected the day before the expected period, 97% 2 days before the expected period, 90% 3 days before and 65% 4 days before the expected period. (*Weeks result 97% in agreement with later ultrasound dating scan. Based on studies of 187 women comparing result to ultrasound dating).For more information on this product or answers to your questions, our Careline advisors are available for you 07:00 – 15:00 hrs Mon-Fri, excluding Bank Holidays



How to use

Please read enclosed instructions carefully before use.



Hazards and Cautions

This device is for home use. Keep out of the reach of children. Please read enclosed instructions carefully before use. Clearblue is a trade mark of SPD Swiss Precision Diagnostics GmbH (‘SPD’). Copyright © 2017 SPD. All rights reserved.



Important info

Country of Origin: United Kingdom

Address: Customer Support, SPD Development Company Ltd, Clearblue Innovation Centre, Priory Business Park, Bedford, MK44 3UP United Kingdom



Ingredients

1 Digital Pregnancy Test
ai_title: Clearblue Digital Pregnancy Test: Weeks Indicator - 1 Test
ai_summary:
Get accurate and easy-to-read pregnancy results with the Clearblue Digital Pregnancy Test with Weeks Indicator. This innovative test provides clear digital results, including how many weeks you've been pregnant (1-2, 2-3, or 3+ weeks). It's a reliable choice for those seeking fast and precise information.
  • Digital display shows "Pregnant" or "Not Pregnant" in clear words.
  • Indicates weeks since conception (1-2, 2-3, or 3+).
  • Over 99% accurate from the day of your expected period.
  • Can be used up to 4 days before your missed period.
  • Easy-to-use and easy-to-read for quick results.

title: Clarins Lip Comfort Oil 09 Chocolate 7ml
description:
A tinted Lip Oil powered by Clarins skin care expertise. 

Lip Comfort Oil is a hydrating, comforting, and nourishing tinted oil that delivers high-gloss shine with a delicate colour. Enriched with 93% ingredients of natural origin including new organic sweetbriar rose oil to bring comfort and nutrition to lips whilst strengthening the barrier function. Hazelnut oil protects lips from drying out and organic jojoba oil guarantees a sensorial texture. The new and improved formula offers 8 hours of protection and 6 hours of hydration and nutrition. The new generation Lip Comfort Oil is available in 8 ultra-nourishing shades with a non-sticky texture. 

How to Use

Glide the new and improved cushioning applicator over the lips for a beautiful shine. Use alone for natural colour on lips, a high shine look and real lip care benefits or over your lipstick, to add volume, shine and comfort to lips.

Lip Comfort Oil can also be used as an overnight treatment for perfectly rejuvenated lips that look and feel more beautiful and softer in the morning.

Suitable for

All skin types

Ingredients

09 CHOCOLATE

POLYGLYCERYL-2 ISOSTEARATE/DIMER DILINOLEATE COPOLYMER. SIMMONDSIA CHINENSIS (JOJOBA) SEED OIL. DILINOLEIC ACID/BUTANEDIOL COPOLYMER. ROSA RUBIGINOSA SEED OIL. CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE. CORYLUS AVELLANA (HAZEL) SEED OIL. DIISOSTEARYL MALATE. CASTOR OIL/IPDI COPOLYMER. TOCOPHERYL ACETATE. PARFUM/FRAGRANCE. VANILLIN. CI 15985/YELLOW 6 LAKE. CI 17200/RED 33 LAKE. CI 15850/RED 7 LAKE. CI 45410/RED 27 [M4050A/03]
ai_summary:
Indulge your lips with Clarins Lip Comfort Oil 09 Chocolate, a luxurious lip treatment that delivers intense hydration and a touch of colour. This nourishing oil is perfect for achieving a naturally enhanced pout with a high-gloss shine.
  • Intense Hydration: Provides 6 hours of hydration and nutrition.
  • Long-lasting Protection: Offers 8 hours of lip protection.
  • Naturally Nourishing: Enriched with 93% ingredients of natural origin, including organic sweetbriar rose oil and organic jojoba oil.
  • Versatile Use: Wear alone for a natural look or layer over lipstick for added shine and volume.
  • Non-Sticky Formula: Delivers a comfortable, high-gloss shine without stickiness.

title: Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturising Lotion+ 15ml Mini
description:
Dermatologist-developed formula that supports a stronger moisture barrier for healthier looking skin. A lightweight, easily absorbed lotion that replenishes lost moisture and strengthens skin with natural moisturizing factors such as glycerin and urea for 8-hour hydration.

Benefits 8 hours of hydration and strengthens your skin's moisture barrier.

Who It's For Very Dry, Dry Combination 

What It Is Dermatologist-developed formula that supports a stronger moisture barrier for healthier looking skin

What It Does • Dramatically Different Moisturising Lotion+ delivers 8-hour hydration and soothing moisture for skin in need of comfort. • This moisturising lotion hydrates to soften, smooth and improve. • Helps strengthen skin’s own moisture barrier so more moisture stays in. • This lotion replenishes skin’s oil-water balance for healthy skin. • Silky lotion slips on easily and absorbs quickly.

Key Ingredients • Natural moisturising factors also known as NMFs including glycerin and urea. They help pull in water and bind moisture to skin to help keep it hydrated and balanced. • Infused with a blend of barley, sunflower and cucumber.

Formula Facts • Non-comedogenic  • Dermatologist tested • Fragrance free • Allergy tested

How To Use • Use this moisturiser twice a day, morning and night. • Spread all over face/throat twice daily, or where needed. • For best results, use after Facial Soap and Clarifying Lotion
ai_summary:
Give your skin the hydration it craves with Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+, a dermatologist-developed formula perfect for dry and combination skin types. This lightweight lotion absorbs quickly, providing 8 hours of hydration and strengthening your skin's moisture barrier for a healthier, more radiant complexion.

  • 8-hour hydration: Replenishes lost moisture for long-lasting comfort.
  • Strengthens skin barrier: Helps lock in moisture for healthier-looking skin.
  • Lightweight and fast-absorbing: Silky texture that won't clog pores.
  • Non-comedogenic and fragrance-free: Suitable for sensitive skin.
  • Contains natural moisturizing factors (NMFs): Including glycerin and urea for optimal hydration.

title: Clarins Super Restorative Night Cream Very Dry Skin 50ml
description:
New innovation for menopausal skin.

The Super Restorative range is ideal for all women experiencing the effects of hormonal changes associated with menopause and has been formulated to support the skin during this stage of a woman's life. The skin is a hormone dependent organ and the changes in hormones during peri and the start of post-menopause result in the skin becoming unbalanced. This disruption means that the skin struggles to protect itself during the day as well as reactivate itself at night. This can result in signs of ageing becoming more visible. The nourishing and revitalising formulas of Super Restorative help to fight visible changes on the skin which include dryness, skin slackening, loss of density, deep-set wrinkles, and an uneven skin tone. 

New research has led to Clarins’ discovery of organic harungana which has intensive replenishment and anti-ageing benefits and offers the same effect as retinol whilst being tolerated by all skin types. Organic harungana is combined with our new plant discovery, organic gorse extract, which helps improve the tone of fibroblasts by up to 89% and provides a firmer, more toned skin alongside other ingredients such as organic desert date extract, organic sea lily and vitamin C derivative. 

Each of the Super Restorative Day & Night creams are formulated to adapt to the skin’s chronobiology. During the day, the skin is vulnerable and needs protection and the squalane extract found in our day formulas reinforces the hydrolipidic film and protects the skin. At night, the skin needs reactivating as microcirculation slows. Organic service tree bud extract helps to stimulate the skins microcirculation and boosts radiance. This innovative day and night duo ensure the skins specific needs are met around the clock.

The Night Cream for Very Dry Skin boosts the skin’s radiance thanks to the service tree bud extract. It is perfect for everyone whose skin needs extra nourishment.



Suitable for

All skin types



How to use

Apply in the morning to clean, dry skin. Warm the cream in the hands then place them over the face, working from the middle outward over the face and neck. Apply by gently pressing into the skin, always from the middle of the face outwards to avoid pulling tissues, enhance drainage and preserve features’ youthful appearance.
ai_summary:
Give your skin the nourishment it craves with Clarins Super Restorative Night Cream, a luxurious formula designed to revitalise mature skin. This rich cream targets the visible signs of ageing associated with hormonal changes, leaving your skin feeling smoother and more radiant. Perfect for those seeking a powerful anti-ageing solution.
  • Intensive Replenishment: Combats dryness and loss of density.
  • Improved Skin Tone: Helps firm and tone skin with organic gorse extract.
  • Reduced Wrinkles: Targets deep-set wrinkles and uneven skin tone.
  • Chronobiology-Adapting Formula: Works with your skin's natural rhythms for optimal results.
  • Suitable for Very Dry Skin: Provides extra nourishment and radiance.
